dk.cit.fyp.controller

Class RestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • dk.cit.fyp.controller.RestController

  • @Controller
public class RestController
extends java.lang.Object
    Restful style web interface used to provide data to web application via ajax but primarily to supply user and race information to mobile app.
    Author:
    Dave Kavanagh

      • getAccountInfo

        @RequestMapping(value="/api/account/{username}",
                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
public Customer getAccountInfo(@PathVariable(value="username")
                                                                                                                              java.lang.String username)
        Get customer account information.
        Parameters:
        username - String username.
        Returns:
        JSON format customer account info.

      • getRace

        @RequestMapping(value="/api/race/{time}",
                method=GET)
 @ResponseBody
public Race getRace(@PathVariable(value="time")
                                                                                                            java.lang.String time)
        Get information regarding a given race time.
        Parameters:
        time - String value representing the time of the raced.
        Returns:
        JSON format race information.

 @ResponseBody
public Race getRaceByHorse(@PathVariable(value="horse")

      • appLogin

        @RequestMapping(value="/api/login",
                method=POST)
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.String appLogin(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Handle login from mobile app.
        Parameters:
        request - HttpServletRequest used to obtain credentials.
        Returns:
        JSON format customer info if successful login, error otherwise.
